alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Atkinson and northern Ware Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms centered near Waycross, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Boggy Bay, Manor, Braganza, Needham, Millwood and Axson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
